mapper.select: SELECT approval_no, approval_date,approval_state, e.employee_no,employee_name FROM approval a join employee e on a.EMPLOYEE_NO=e.EMPLOYEE_NO join document d on d.document_no = a.document_no join dayoff_apply da on da.document_no = d.document_no where da.dayoff_no = #{dayoff_no}
select employee_no, dayoff_days as effect_day from employee join dayoff_create_terms dct on trunc(months_between(sysdate,hiredate)/12,0) = year_in_office
mapper.insert: insert into dayoff_create_recode values (#{employee_no}, sysdate, #{effect_day}, #{effect_day} + (select reward_dayoff+previous_dayoff from dayoff_my_recode where employee_no = #{employee_no}),1, #{dayoff_generator}, '금년발생일(${effect_day})')
mapper.update: update dayoff_my_recode set annual_dayoff = #{effect_day} where employee_no = #{employee_no}
mapper.select: select * from dayoff_create_recode where employee_no = #{employee_no} and to_char(sysdate,'yyyy') = to_char(generation_date,'yyyy') order by generation_date asc

select dayoff_no, total_days, da.dayoff_type_code from dayoff_apply da join dayoff_kinds dk on da.dayoff_type_code = dk.dayoff_type_code join document d on da.document_no = d.document_no where (dayoff_deduction = '1' or da.dayoff_type_code = 2) and d.document_state != '반려' and da.employee_no = #{employee_no}
mapper.insert: insert into document values (document_seq.nextval,'휴가신청',(select form_contents from form where form_no = 103),#{employee.employee_no},sysdate,'진행')
insert into approval values (approval_seq.nextval,(select nvl(max(document_no),1) from document),#{employee.employee_no},sysdate,'1',approval_seq.currval+1)
insert into approval values (approval_seq.nextval,(select nvl(max(document_no),1) from document),#{employee.employee_no},'','0',approval_seq.currval+1)
insert into approval values (approval_seq.nextval,(select nvl(max(document_no),1) from document),#{employee.employee_no},'','0',0)

insert into dayoff_apply values (dayoff_apply_seq.nextval, #{total_days}, #{start_date}, #{end_date}, #{employee.employee_no}, #{dayoff_kind.dayoff_type_code},(select nvl(max(document_no),1) from document),#{dayoff_reason} )
insert into dayoff_apply_detail values ((select nvl(max(dayoff_no),1) from dayoff_apply),#{dayoff_day},#{days},#{oneorhalf} )
mapper.select: select da.dayoff_no, e.employee_name, dayoff_name, da.total_days, start_date, end_date, document_state from dayoff_apply da join document d on da.document_no = d.document_no join employee e on d.document_writer_no = e.employee_no join dayoff_kinds dk on da.dayoff_type_code = dk.dayoff_type_code where da.employee_no =#{employee_no} order by document_date desc

select da.dayoff_no, document_date, document_state, eda.employee_name, ed.employee_name, department_name, dayoff_name, total_days,dayoff_reason from dayoff_apply da join document d on da.document_no = d.document_no join employee ed on d.document_writer_no = ed.employee_no join dayoff_kinds dk on da.dayoff_type_code = dk.dayoff_type_code join employee eda on da.employee_no = eda.employee_no join department dep on eda.department_no = dep.department_no where da.dayoff_no = #{dayoff_no}

select da.dayoff_no, e.employee_name, e.department_no from dayoff_apply da join document d on da.document_no = d.document_no join employee e on da.employee_no = e.employee_no join department de on e.department_no = de.department_no where document_state = '진행' and to_char(start_date,'yyyy-mm') = '${year}-${month}'
